name: Battle For Seattle
description:
Play as your friendly neighbourhood Anarchist and run through the streets of Seattle as you smash symbols of corporate capital and defend yourself from an oppressive police force! The more capital you smash the more cultural capital you gain. You can spend your cultural capital to upgrade your character.

Features:
  • Side scrolling beat 'em up action!
  • 4 playable characters, each with their own special abilities!
  • A store featuring 5 upgrades you can purchase with your cultural capital.
